org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class ReplicaBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.ReplicaBuilder

  • public class ReplicaBuilder
extends Object
    This class is to be used as a builder for ReplicaInfo objects. The state of the replica is used to determine which object is instantiated.
